properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 12:23PM AKST until February 19 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on slippery road
conditions. In addition, areas of poor visibility are expected.
Total snow accumulations of one to three inches are expected.
Visibility may be reduced to one half mile or less at times.

* WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast.

* WHEN...Noon Tuesday to noon Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO NOON AKST WEDNESDAY
